thread.section_title: Hotel de l'Academie - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Boutique friendly hotel in ideal location
thread.title_full: Boutique friendly hotel in ideal location - Review of Hotel de l'Academie, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dicksondick
title: Boutique friendly hotel in ideal location
text: Lovely wee hotel in easy walking distance of Ile de la Cite and the city centre, and simply accessed by metro. The rooms are compact but very comfortable and full of character. Lovely helpful staff - altogether highly recommended.
